title: Completion of Construction of Buildings for Faculty of Agriculture, Ariviyal Nagar Kilinochchi, University of Jaffna
decision_details:
1. - the following proposals made by the Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, pertaining to the University of Jaffna at Kilinochchi, was approved by the Cabinet: 
2. 	
*	to establish the Faculty of Agriculture and the Faculty of Engineering at Ariviyal Nagar Kilinochchi;

*	to renovate and develop uncompleted buildings at Ariviyal Nagar; and

*	to commence this project in 2012 and complete it within three years.


Funds required for the purpose are to be provided under the Medium Term Budgetary Frame Work.
